  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_97472</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_97472</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical test for carbon dioxide gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemischer Test für Kohlendioxydgas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai chimique pour le gaz d'anhydride carbonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste químico para o gás do dióxido de 
carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova chimica per il gas dell'anidride carbonica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική δοκιμή για το διοξείδιο του άνθρακα αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba química para el gas del bióxido de 
carbono</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the chemical test to tell if there is carbon dioxide gas. The gas given off is carbon dioxide if the lime-water added turns milky.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime-water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">milky solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den chemischen Test, um zu 
erklären, wenn es Kohlendioxydgas gibt. Das abgegebene Gas ist 
Kohlendioxyd, wenn das Kalk-Wasser die milchigen Umdrehungen 
hinzufügte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que l'essai chimique 
indiquait s'il y a gaz d'anhydride carbonique. Le gaz dégagé 
est anhydride carbonique si la chaux-eau ajoutait des tours laiteux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o teste químico para 
dizer se houver um gás do dióxido de carbono. O gás dado fora
é dióxido de carbono se a cal-água adicionar as voltas leitosas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la prova chimica per 
dire a se ci è gas dell'anidride carbonica. Il gas emanato è 
anidride carbonica se l'calce-acqua aggiungesse le girate lattee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει χημική δοκιμή για να πει 
εάν υπάρχει διοξείδιο του άνθρακα αέριο. Αέριο 
εκπεμμμένη είναι διοξείδιο του άνθρακα εάν το ασβέστης-ύδωρ 
προστιθέμενο γίνεται γαλακτώδες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la prueba química para 
decir si hay gas del bióxido de carbono. El gas emitido es 
bióxido de carbono si el cal-agua agregó las vueltas lechosas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemischer Test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalk-Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">milchige Lösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">essai chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaux-eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solution laiteuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teste químico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cal-água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">solução leitosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prova chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calce-acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soluzione lattea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημική δοκιμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ασβέστης-ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γαλακτώδης λύση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">prueba química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cal-agua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">solución lechosa</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
